2343  New_Func += solverTurb->GetRes_RMS(iVar);
2344  }
2345  }
2346 
2347  /* Compute the difference in the nonlinear residuals between the
2348  current and previous iterations. */
2349 
2350  NonLinRes_Func = (New_Func - Old_Func);
2351  NonLinRes_Series[NonLinRes_Counter] = NonLinRes_Func;
2352 
2353  /* Increment the counter, if we hit the max size, then start over. */
2354 
2355  NonLinRes_Counter++;
2356  if (NonLinRes_Counter == Res_Count) NonLinRes_Counter = 0;
2357 
2358  /* Sum the total change in nonlinear residuals over the previous
2359  set of all stored iterations. */
2360 
2361  NonLinRes_Value = New_Func;
2362  if (config->GetTimeIter() >= Res_Count) {
2363  NonLinRes_Value = 0.0;
2364  for (unsigned short iCounter = 0; iCounter < Res_Count; iCounter++)
2365  NonLinRes_Value += NonLinRes_Series[iCounter];
2366  }
2367 
2368  /* If the sum is larger than a small fraction of the current nonlinear
2369  residual, then we are not decreasing the nonlinear residual at a high
2370  rate. In this situation, we force a reduction of the CFL in all cells.
2371  Reset the array so that we delay the next decrease for some iterations. */
2372 
2373  if (fabs(NonLinRes_Value) < 0.1*New_Func) {
2374  reduceCFL = true;
2375  NonLinRes_Counter = 0;
2376  for (unsigned short iCounter = 0; iCounter < Res_Count; iCounter++)
2377  NonLinRes_Series[iCounter] = New_Func;
2378  }
2379 
2380  /* Loop over all points on this grid and apply CFL adaption. */
2381 
2382  su2double myCFLMin = 1e30;
2383  su2double myCFLMax = 0.0;
2384  su2double myCFLSum = 0.0;
2385  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry[iMesh]->GetnPointDomain(); iPoint++) {
2386 
2387  /* Get the current local flow CFL number at this point. */
2388 
2389  su2double CFL = solverFlow->GetNodes()->GetLocalCFL(iPoint);
2390 
2391  /* Get the current under-relaxation parameters that were computed
2392  during the previous nonlinear update. If we have a turbulence model,
2393  take the minimum under-relaxation parameter between the mean flow
2394  and turbulence systems. */
2395 
2396  su2double underRelaxationFlow = solverFlow->GetNodes()->GetUnderRelaxation(iPoint);
2397  su2double underRelaxationTurb = 1.0;
2398  if ((iMesh == MESH_0) && (config->GetKind_Turb_Model() != NONE))
2399  underRelaxationTurb = solverTurb->GetNodes()->GetUnderRelaxation(iPoint);
2400  const su2double underRelaxation = min(underRelaxationFlow,underRelaxationTurb);
2401 
2402  /* If we apply a small under-relaxation parameter for stability,
2403  then we should reduce the CFL before the next iteration. If we
2404  are able to add the entire nonlinear update (under-relaxation = 1)
2405  then we schedule an increase the CFL number for the next iteration. */
2406 
2407  su2double CFLFactor = 1.0;
2408  if ((underRelaxation < 0.1)) {
2409  CFLFactor = CFLFactorDecrease;
2410  } else if (underRelaxation >= 0.1 && underRelaxation < 1.0) {
2411  CFLFactor = 1.0;
2412  } else {
2413  CFLFactor = CFLFactorIncrease;
2414  }
2415 
2416  /* Check if we are hitting the min or max and adjust. */
2417 
2418  if (CFL*CFLFactor <= CFLMin) {
2419  CFL = CFLMin;
2420  CFLFactor = MGFactor[iMesh];
2421  } else if (CFL*CFLFactor >= CFLMax) {
2422  CFL = CFLMax;
2423  CFLFactor = MGFactor[iMesh];
2424  }
2425 
2426  /* If we detect a stalled nonlinear residual, then force the CFL
2427  for all points to the minimum temporarily to restart the ramp. */
2428 
2429  if (reduceCFL) {
2430  CFL = CFLMin;
2431  CFLFactor = MGFactor[iMesh];
2432  }
2433 
2434  /* Apply the adjustment to the CFL and store local values. */
2435 
2436  CFL *= CFLFactor;
2437  solverFlow->GetNodes()->SetLocalCFL(iPoint, CFL);
2438  if ((iMesh == MESH_0) && (config->GetKind_Turb_Model() != NONE)) {
2439  solverTurb->GetNodes()->SetLocalCFL(iPoint, CFL);
2440  }
2441 
2442  /* Store min and max CFL for reporting on fine grid. */
2443 
2444  myCFLMin = min(CFL,myCFLMin);
2445  myCFLMax = max(CFL,myCFLMax);
2446  myCFLSum += CFL;
2447 
2448  }
2449 
2450  /* Reduce the min/max/avg local CFL numbers. */
2451 
2452  su2double rbuf_min, sbuf_min;
2453  sbuf_min = myCFLMin;
2454  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&sbuf_min, &rbuf_min, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2455  Min_CFL_Local = rbuf_min;
2456 
2457  su2double rbuf_max, sbuf_max;
2458  sbuf_max = myCFLMax;
2459  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&sbuf_max, &rbuf_max, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2460  Max_CFL_Local = rbuf_max;
2461 
2462  su2double rbuf_sum, sbuf_sum;
2463  sbuf_sum = myCFLSum;
2464  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&sbuf_sum, &rbuf_sum, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2465  Avg_CFL_Local = rbuf_sum;
2466 
2467  unsigned long Global_nPointDomain;
2468  unsigned long Local_nPointDomain = geometry[iMesh]->GetnPointDomain();
2469  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nPointDomain, &Global_nPointDomain, 1,
2470  MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2471  Avg_CFL_Local /= (su2double)Global_nPointDomain;
2472 
2473  }
2474 
2475 }
2476 
2477 void CSolver::SetResidual_RMS(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
2478  unsigned short iVar;
2479 
2480 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
2481 
2482  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2483 
2484  if (GetRes_RMS(iVar) != GetRes_RMS(iVar)) {
2485  SU2_MPI::Error("SU2 has diverged. (NaN detected)", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2486  }
2487  if (log10(sqrt(GetRes_RMS(iVar)/geometry->GetnPoint())) > 20 ){
2488  SU2_MPI::Error("SU2 has diverged. (Residual > 10^20 detected)", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2489  }
2490 
2491  SetRes_RMS(iVar, max(EPS*EPS, sqrt(GetRes_RMS(iVar)/geometry->GetnPoint())));
2492 
2493  }
2494 
2495 #else
2496 
2497  int nProcessor = size, iProcessor;
2498 
2499  su2double *sbuf_residual, *rbuf_residual, *sbuf_coord, *rbuf_coord, *Coord;
2500  unsigned long *sbuf_point, *rbuf_point, Global_nPointDomain;
2501  unsigned short iDim;
2502 
2503  /*--- Set the L2 Norm residual in all the processors ---*/
2504 
2505  sbuf_residual = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) sbuf_residual[iVar] = 0.0;
2506  rbuf_residual = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) rbuf_residual[iVar] = 0.0;
2507 
2508  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) sbuf_residual[iVar] = GetRes_RMS(iVar);
2509 
2510  if (config->GetComm_Level() == COMM_FULL) {
2511 
2512  unsigned long Local_nPointDomain = geometry->GetnPointDomain();
2513  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(sbuf_residual, rbuf_residual, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2514  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nPointDomain, &Global_nPointDomain, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2515 
2516  } else {
2517 
2518  /*--- Reduced MPI comms have been requested. Use a local residual only. ---*/
2519 
2520  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) rbuf_residual[iVar] = sbuf_residual[iVar];
2521  Global_nPointDomain = geometry->GetnPointDomain();
2522 
2523  }
2524 
2525 
2526  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2527 
2528  if (rbuf_residual[iVar] != rbuf_residual[iVar]) {
2529  SU2_MPI::Error("SU2 has diverged. (NaN detected)", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2530  }
2531 
2532  SetRes_RMS(iVar, max(EPS*EPS, sqrt(rbuf_residual[iVar]/Global_nPointDomain)));
2533 
2534  }
2535 
2536  delete [] sbuf_residual;
2537  delete [] rbuf_residual;
2538 
2539  /*--- Set the Maximum residual in all the processors ---*/
2540 
2541  if (config->GetComm_Level() == COMM_FULL) {
2542 
2543  sbuf_residual = new su2double [nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) sbuf_residual[iVar] = 0.0;
2544  sbuf_point = new unsigned long [nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) sbuf_point[iVar] = 0;
2545  sbuf_coord = new su2double[nVar*nDim]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar*nDim; iVar++) sbuf_coord[iVar] = 0.0;
2546 
2547  rbuf_residual = new su2double [nProcessor*nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nProcessor*nVar; iVar++) rbuf_residual[iVar] = 0.0;
2548  rbuf_point = new unsigned long [nProcessor*nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nProcessor*nVar; iVar++) rbuf_point[iVar] = 0;
2549  rbuf_coord = new su2double[nProcessor*nVar*nDim]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nProcessor*nVar*nDim; iVar++) rbuf_coord[iVar] = 0.0;
2550 
2551  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2552  sbuf_residual[iVar] = GetRes_Max(iVar);
2553  sbuf_point[iVar] = GetPoint_Max(iVar);
2554  Coord = GetPoint_Max_Coord(iVar);
2555  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2556  sbuf_coord[iVar*nDim+iDim] = Coord[iDim];
2557  }
2558 
2559  SU2_MPI::Allgather(sbuf_residual, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, rbuf_residual, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2560  SU2_MPI::Allgather(sbuf_point, nVar, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, rbuf_point, nVar, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2561  SU2_MPI::Allgather(sbuf_coord, nVar*nDim, MPI_DOUBLE, rbuf_coord, nVar*nDim, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2562 
2563  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2564  for (iProcessor = 0; iProcessor < nProcessor; iProcessor++) {
2565  AddRes_Max(iVar, rbuf_residual[iProcessor*nVar+iVar], rbuf_point[iProcessor*nVar+iVar], &rbuf_coord[iProcessor*nVar*nDim+iVar*nDim]);
2566  }
2567  }
2568 
2569  delete [] sbuf_residual;
2570  delete [] rbuf_residual;
2571 
2572  delete [] sbuf_point;
2573  delete [] rbuf_point;
2574 
2575  delete [] sbuf_coord;
2576  delete [] rbuf_coord;
2577 
2578  }
2579 
2580 #endif
2581 
2582 }
2583 
2584 void CSolver::SetResidual_BGS(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
2585  unsigned short iVar;
2586 
2587 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
2588 
2589  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2590 
2591 // if (GetRes_BGS(iVar) != GetRes_BGS(iVar)) {
2592 // SU2_MPI::Error("SU2 has diverged.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2593 // }
2594 
2595  SetRes_BGS(iVar, max(EPS*EPS, sqrt(GetRes_BGS(iVar)/geometry->GetnPoint())));
2596 
2597  }
2598 
2599 #else
2600 
2601  int nProcessor = size, iProcessor;
2602 
2603  su2double *sbuf_residual, *rbuf_residual, *sbuf_coord, *rbuf_coord, *Coord;
2604  unsigned long *sbuf_point, *rbuf_point, Local_nPointDomain, Global_nPointDomain;
2605  unsigned short iDim;
2606 
2607  /*--- Set the L2 Norm residual in all the processors ---*/
2608 
2609  sbuf_residual = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) sbuf_residual[iVar] = 0.0;
2610  rbuf_residual = new su2double[nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) rbuf_residual[iVar] = 0.0;
2611 
2612  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) sbuf_residual[iVar] = GetRes_BGS(iVar);
2613  Local_nPointDomain = geometry->GetnPointDomain();
2614 
2615 
2616  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(sbuf_residual, rbuf_residual, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2617  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&Local_nPointDomain, &Global_nPointDomain, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2618 
2619 
2620  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2621 
2622 // if (rbuf_residual[iVar] != rbuf_residual[iVar]) {
2623 
2624 // SU2_MPI::Error("SU2 has diverged (NaN detected)", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2625 
2626 // }
2627 
2628  SetRes_BGS(iVar, max(EPS*EPS, sqrt(rbuf_residual[iVar]/Global_nPointDomain)));
2629 
2630  }
2631 
2632  delete [] sbuf_residual;
2633  delete [] rbuf_residual;
2634 
2635  /*--- Set the Maximum residual in all the processors ---*/
2636  sbuf_residual = new su2double [nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) sbuf_residual[iVar] = 0.0;
2637  sbuf_point = new unsigned long [nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) sbuf_point[iVar] = 0;
2638  sbuf_coord = new su2double[nVar*nDim]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar*nDim; iVar++) sbuf_coord[iVar] = 0.0;
2639 
2640  rbuf_residual = new su2double [nProcessor*nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nProcessor*nVar; iVar++) rbuf_residual[iVar] = 0.0;
2641  rbuf_point = new unsigned long [nProcessor*nVar]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nProcessor*nVar; iVar++) rbuf_point[iVar] = 0;
2642  rbuf_coord = new su2double[nProcessor*nVar*nDim]; for (iVar = 0; iVar < nProcessor*nVar*nDim; iVar++) rbuf_coord[iVar] = 0.0;
2643 
2644  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2645  sbuf_residual[iVar] = GetRes_Max_BGS(iVar);
2646  sbuf_point[iVar] = GetPoint_Max_BGS(iVar);
2647  Coord = GetPoint_Max_Coord_BGS(iVar);
2648  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2649  sbuf_coord[iVar*nDim+iDim] = Coord[iDim];
2650  }
2651 
2652  SU2_MPI::Allgather(sbuf_residual, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, rbuf_residual, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2653  SU2_MPI::Allgather(sbuf_point, nVar, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, rbuf_point, nVar, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2654  SU2_MPI::Allgather(sbuf_coord, nVar*nDim, MPI_DOUBLE, rbuf_coord, nVar*nDim, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
2655 
2656  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
2657  for (iProcessor = 0; iProcessor < nProcessor; iProcessor++) {
2658  AddRes_Max_BGS(iVar, rbuf_residual[iProcessor*nVar+iVar], rbuf_point[iProcessor*nVar+iVar], &rbuf_coord[iProcessor*nVar*nDim+iVar*nDim]);
2659  }
2660  }
2661 
2662  delete [] sbuf_residual;
2663  delete [] rbuf_residual;
2664 
2665  delete [] sbuf_point;
2666  delete [] rbuf_point;
2667 
2668  delete [] sbuf_coord;
2669  delete [] rbuf_coord;
2670 
2671 #endif
2672 
2673 }
2674 
2675 void CSolver::SetRotatingFrame_GCL(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
2676 
2677  unsigned short iDim, nDim = geometry->GetnDim(), iVar, nVar = GetnVar(), iMarker;
2678  unsigned long iVertex, iEdge;
2679  su2double ProjGridVel, *Normal;
2680 
2681  /*--- Loop interior edges ---*/
2682 
2683  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
2684 
2685  const unsigned long iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
2686  const unsigned long jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
2687 
2688  /*--- Solution at each edge point ---*/
2689 
2690  su2double *Solution_i = base_nodes->GetSolution(iPoint);
2691  su2double *Solution_j = base_nodes->GetSolution(jPoint);
2692 
2693  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
2694  Solution[iVar] = 0.5* (Solution_i[iVar] + Solution_j[iVar]);
2695 
2696  /*--- Grid Velocity at each edge point ---*/
2697 
2698  su2double *GridVel_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
2699  su2double *GridVel_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetGridVel();
2700  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2701  Vector[iDim] = 0.5* (GridVel_i[iDim] + GridVel_j[iDim]);
2702 
2703  Normal = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNormal();
2704 
2705  ProjGridVel = 0.0;
2706  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2707  ProjGridVel += Vector[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
2708 
2709  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
2710  Residual[iVar] = ProjGridVel*Solution_i[iVar];
2711 
2712  LinSysRes.AddBlock(iPoint, Residual);
2713 
2714  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
2715  Residual[iVar] = ProjGridVel*Solution_j[iVar];
2716 
2717  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(jPoint, Residual);
2718 
2719  }
2720 
2721  /*--- Loop boundary edges ---*/
2722 
2723  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < geometry->GetnMarker(); iMarker++) {
2724  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERNAL_BOUNDARY) &&
2725  (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)) {
2726  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->GetnVertex(iMarker); iVertex++) {
2727  const unsigned long Point = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2728 
2729  /*--- Solution at each edge point ---*/
2730 
2731  su2double *Solution = base_nodes->GetSolution(Point);
2732 
2733  /*--- Grid Velocity at each edge point ---*/
2734 
2735  su2double *GridVel = geometry->node[Point]->GetGridVel();
2736 
2737  /*--- Summed normal components ---*/
2738 
2739  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
2740 
2741  ProjGridVel = 0.0;
2742  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2743  ProjGridVel += GridVel[iDim]*Normal[iDim];
2744 
2745  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
2746  Residual[iVar] = ProjGridVel*Solution[iVar];
2747 
2748  LinSysRes.SubtractBlock(Point, Residual);
2749 
2750  }
2751  }
2752  }
2753 
2754 }
2755 
2756 void CSolver::SetAuxVar_Gradient_GG(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
2757 
2758  unsigned long Point = 0, iPoint = 0, jPoint = 0, iEdge, iVertex;
2759  unsigned short nDim = geometry->GetnDim(), iDim, iMarker;
2760 
2761  su2double AuxVar_Vertex, AuxVar_i, AuxVar_j, AuxVar_Average;
2762  su2double *Gradient, DualArea, Partial_Res, Grad_Val, *Normal;
2763 
2764  /*--- Set Gradient to Zero ---*/
2765 
2766  base_nodes->SetAuxVarGradientZero();
2767 
2768  /*--- Loop interior edges ---*/
2769 
2770  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
2771  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
2772  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
2773 
2774  AuxVar_i = base_nodes->GetAuxVar(iPoint);
2775  AuxVar_j = base_nodes->GetAuxVar(jPoint);
2776 
2777  Normal = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNormal();
2778  AuxVar_Average = 0.5 * ( AuxVar_i + AuxVar_j);
2779  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2780  Partial_Res = AuxVar_Average*Normal[iDim];
2781  base_nodes->AddAuxVarGradient(iPoint, iDim, Partial_Res);
2782  base_nodes->SubtractAuxVarGradient(jPoint,iDim, Partial_Res);
2783  }
2784  }
2785 
2786  /*--- Loop boundary edges ---*/
2787 
2788  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < geometry->GetnMarker(); iMarker++)
2789  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERNAL_BOUNDARY) &&
2790  (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)) {
2791  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->GetnVertex(iMarker); iVertex++) {
2792  Point = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2793  AuxVar_Vertex = base_nodes->GetAuxVar(Point);
2794  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
2795  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2796  Partial_Res = AuxVar_Vertex*Normal[iDim];
2797  base_nodes->SubtractAuxVarGradient(Point,iDim, Partial_Res);
2798  }
2799  }
2800  }
2801 
2802  for (iPoint=0; iPoint<geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++)
2803  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2804  Gradient = base_nodes->GetAuxVarGradient(iPoint);
2805  DualArea = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume();
2806  Grad_Val = Gradient[iDim]/(DualArea+EPS);
2807  base_nodes->SetAuxVarGradient(iPoint, iDim, Grad_Val);
2808  }
2809 
2810  /*--- Gradient MPI ---*/
2811 
2812  InitiateComms(geometry, config, AUXVAR_GRADIENT);
2813  CompleteComms(geometry, config, AUXVAR_GRADIENT);
2814 
2815 }
2816 
2817 void CSolver::SetAuxVar_Gradient_LS(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
2818 
2819  unsigned short iDim, jDim, iNeigh;
2820  unsigned short nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
2821  unsigned long iPoint, jPoint;
2822  su2double *Coord_i, *Coord_j, AuxVar_i, AuxVar_j, weight, r11, r12, r13, r22, r23, r23_a,
2823  r23_b, r33, z11, z12, z13, z22, z23, z33, detR2, product;
2824  bool singular = false;
2825 
2826  su2double *Cvector = new su2double [nDim];
2827 
2828  /*--- Loop over points of the grid ---*/
2829 
2830  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
2831 
2832  Coord_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
2833  AuxVar_i = base_nodes->GetAuxVar(iPoint);
2834 
2835  /*--- Inizialization of variables ---*/
2836  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2837  Cvector[iDim] = 0.0;
2838 
2839  r11 = 0.0; r12 = 0.0; r13 = 0.0; r22 = 0.0;
2840  r23 = 0.0; r23_a = 0.0; r23_b = 0.0; r33 = 0.0;
2841 
2842  for (iNeigh = 0; iNeigh < geometry->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNeigh++) {
2843  jPoint = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNeigh);
2844  Coord_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord();
2845  AuxVar_j = base_nodes->GetAuxVar(jPoint);
2846 
2847  weight = 0.0;
2848  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2849  weight += (Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim])*(Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim]);
2850 
2851  /*--- Sumations for entries of upper triangular matrix R ---*/
2852 
2853  if (fabs(weight) > EPS) {
2854  r11 += (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])/weight;
2855  r12 += (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])/weight;
2856  r22 += (Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])*(Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])/weight;
2857  if (nDim == 3) {
2858  r13 += (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/weight;
2859  r23_a += (Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/weight;
2860  r23_b += (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/weight;
2861  r33 += (Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/weight;
2862  }
2863 
2864  /*--- Entries of c:= transpose(A)*b ---*/
2865 
2866  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2867  Cvector[iDim] += (Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim])*(AuxVar_j-AuxVar_i)/(weight);
2868  }
2869 
2870  }
2871 
2872  /*--- Entries of upper triangular matrix R ---*/
2873 
2874  if (fabs(r11) < EPS) r11 = EPS;
2875  r11 = sqrt(r11);
2876  r12 = r12/r11;
2877  r22 = sqrt(r22-r12*r12);
2878  if (fabs(r22) < EPS) r22 = EPS;
2879  if (nDim == 3) {
2880  r13 = r13/r11;
2881  r23 = r23_a/(r22) - r23_b*r12/(r11*r22);
2882  r33 = sqrt(r33-r23*r23-r13*r13);
2883  }
2884 
2885  /*--- Compute determinant ---*/
2886 
2887  if (nDim == 2) detR2 = (r11*r22)*(r11*r22);
2888  else detR2 = (r11*r22*r33)*(r11*r22*r33);
2889 
2890  /*--- Detect singular matrices ---*/
2891 
2892  if (fabs(detR2) < EPS) singular = true;
2893 
2894  /*--- S matrix := inv(R)*traspose(inv(R)) ---*/
2895 
2896  if (singular) {
2897  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
2898  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
2899  Smatrix[iDim][jDim] = 0.0;
2900  }
2901  else {
2902  if (nDim == 2) {
2903  Smatrix[0][0] = (r12*r12+r22*r22)/detR2;
2904  Smatrix[0][1] = -r11*r12/detR2;
2905  Smatrix[1][0] = Smatrix[0][1];
2906  Smatrix[1][1] = r11*r11/detR2;
2907  }
2908  else {
2909  z11 = r22*r33; z12 = -r12*r33; z13 = r12*r23-r13*r22;
2910  z22 = r11*r33; z23 = -r11*r23; z33 = r11*r22;
2911  Smatrix[0][0] = (z11*z11+z12*z12+z13*z13)/detR2;
2912  Smatrix[0][1] = (z12*z22+z13*z23)/detR2;
2913  Smatrix[0][2] = (z13*z33)/detR2;
2914  Smatrix[1][0] = Smatrix[0][1];
2915  Smatrix[1][1] = (z22*z22+z23*z23)/detR2;
2916  Smatrix[1][2] = (z23*z33)/detR2;
2917  Smatrix[2][0] = Smatrix[0][2];
2918  Smatrix[2][1] = Smatrix[1][2];
2919  Smatrix[2][2] = (z33*z33)/detR2;
2920  }
2921  }
2922 
2923  /*--- Computation of the gradient: S*c ---*/
2924 
2925  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2926  product = 0.0;
2927  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
2928  product += Smatrix[iDim][jDim]*Cvector[jDim];
2929  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain())
2930  base_nodes->SetAuxVarGradient(iPoint, iDim, product);
2931  }
2932  }
2933 
2934  delete [] Cvector;
2935 
2936  /*--- Gradient MPI ---*/
2937 
2938  InitiateComms(geometry, config, AUXVAR_GRADIENT);
2939  CompleteComms(geometry, config, AUXVAR_GRADIENT);
2940 
2941 }
2942 
2943 void CSolver::SetSolution_Gradient_GG(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, bool reconstruction) {
2944  unsigned long Point = 0, iPoint = 0, jPoint = 0, iEdge, iVertex;
2945  unsigned short iVar, iDim, iMarker;
2946  su2double *Solution_Vertex, *Solution_i, *Solution_j, Solution_Average, **Gradient,
2947  Partial_Res, Grad_Val, *Normal, Vol;
2948 
2949  /*--- Set Gradient to Zero ---*/
2950  base_nodes->SetGradientZero();
2951 
2952  /*--- Loop interior edges ---*/
2953  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
2954  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
2955  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
2956 
2957  Solution_i = base_nodes->GetSolution(iPoint);
2958  Solution_j = base_nodes->GetSolution(jPoint);
2959  Normal = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNormal();
2960  for (iVar = 0; iVar< nVar; iVar++) {
2961  Solution_Average = 0.5 * (Solution_i[iVar] + Solution_j[iVar]);
2962  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2963  Partial_Res = Solution_Average*Normal[iDim];
2964  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain())
2965  base_nodes->AddGradient(iPoint, iVar, iDim, Partial_Res);
2966  if (geometry->node[jPoint]->GetDomain())
2967  base_nodes->SubtractGradient(jPoint,iVar, iDim, Partial_Res);
2968  }
2969  }
2970  }
2971 
2972  /*--- Loop boundary edges ---*/
2973  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < geometry->GetnMarker(); iMarker++) {
2974  if ((config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != INTERNAL_BOUNDARY) &&
2975  (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != PERIODIC_BOUNDARY)) {
2976  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->GetnVertex(iMarker); iVertex++) {
2977  Point = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
2978  Solution_Vertex = base_nodes->GetSolution(Point);
2979  Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
2980  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
2981  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
2982  Partial_Res = Solution_Vertex[iVar]*Normal[iDim];
2983  if (geometry->node[Point]->GetDomain())
2984  base_nodes->SubtractGradient(Point,iVar, iDim, Partial_Res);
2985  }
2986  }
2987  }
2988  }
2989 
2990  /*--- Correct the gradient values for any periodic boundaries. ---*/
2991 
2992  for (unsigned short iPeriodic = 1; iPeriodic <= config->GetnMarker_Periodic()/2; iPeriodic++) {
2993  InitiatePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_SOL_GG);
2994  CompletePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_SOL_GG);
2995  }
2996 
2997  /*--- Compute gradient ---*/
2998  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPointDomain(); iPoint++) {
2999 
3000  /*--- Get the volume, which may include periodic components. ---*/
3001 
3002  Vol = (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetVolume() +
3003  geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPeriodicVolume());
3004 
3005  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3006  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3007  Gradient = base_nodes->GetGradient(iPoint);
3008  Grad_Val = Gradient[iVar][iDim] / (Vol+EPS);
3009  if (reconstruction)
3010  base_nodes->SetGradient_Reconstruction(iPoint, iVar, iDim, Grad_Val);
3011  else
3012  base_nodes->SetGradient(iPoint, iVar, iDim, Grad_Val);
3013  }
3014  }
3015 
3016  }
3017 
3018  /*--- Gradient MPI ---*/
3019 
3020  InitiateComms(geometry, config, SOLUTION_GRADIENT);
3021  CompleteComms(geometry, config, SOLUTION_GRADIENT);
3022 
3023 }
3024 
3025 void CSolver::SetSolution_Gradient_LS(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, bool reconstruction) {
3026 
3027  unsigned short iDim, jDim, iVar, iNeigh;
3028  unsigned long iPoint, jPoint;
3029  su2double *Coord_i, *Coord_j, *Solution_i, *Solution_j;
3030  su2double r11, r12, r13, r22, r23, r23_a, r23_b, r33, weight;
3031  su2double detR2, z11, z12, z13, z22, z23, z33;
3032  bool singular = false;
3033 
3034  /*--- Set a flag for unweighted or weighted least-squares. ---*/
3035 
3036  bool weighted = true;
3037  if (reconstruction) {
3038  if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method_Recon() == LEAST_SQUARES)
3039  weighted = false;
3040  } else if (config->GetKind_Gradient_Method() == LEAST_SQUARES) {
3041  weighted = false;
3042  }
3043 
3044  /*--- Clear Rmatrix, which could eventually be computed once
3045  and stored for static meshes, as well as the gradient. ---*/
3046 
3047  base_nodes->SetRmatrixZero();
3048  base_nodes->SetGradientZero();
3049 
3050  /*--- Loop over points of the grid ---*/
3051 
3052  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPointDomain(); iPoint++) {
3053 
3054  /*--- Set the value of the singular ---*/
3055  singular = false;
3056 
3057  /*--- Get coordinates ---*/
3058 
3059  Coord_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
3060 
3061  /*--- Get consevative solution ---*/
3062 
3063  Solution_i = base_nodes->GetSolution(iPoint);
3064 
3065  /*--- Inizialization of variables ---*/
3066 
3067  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++)
3068  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3069  Cvector[iVar][iDim] = 0.0;
3070 
3071  for (iNeigh = 0; iNeigh < geometry->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNeigh++) {
3072  jPoint = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNeigh);
3073  Coord_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord();
3074 
3075  Solution_j = base_nodes->GetSolution(jPoint);
3076 
3077  if (weighted) {
3078  weight = 0.0;
3079  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3080  weight += (Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim])*(Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim]);
3081  } else {
3082  weight = 1.0;
3083  }
3084 
3085  /*--- Sumations for entries of upper triangular matrix R ---*/
3086 
3087  if (weight != 0.0) {
3088 
3089  base_nodes->AddRmatrix(iPoint,0, 0, (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])/weight);
3090  base_nodes->AddRmatrix(iPoint,0, 1, (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])/weight);
3091  base_nodes->AddRmatrix(iPoint,1, 1, (Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])*(Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])/weight);
3092 
3093  if (nDim == 3) {
3094  base_nodes->AddRmatrix(iPoint,0, 2, (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/weight);
3095  base_nodes->AddRmatrix(iPoint,1, 2, (Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/weight);
3096  base_nodes->AddRmatrix(iPoint,2, 1, (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/weight);
3097  base_nodes->AddRmatrix(iPoint,2, 2, (Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/weight);
3098  }
3099 
3100  /*--- Entries of c:= transpose(A)*b ---*/
3101 
3102  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3103  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3104  base_nodes->AddGradient(iPoint, iVar,iDim, (Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim])*(Solution_j[iVar]-Solution_i[iVar])/weight);
3105  }
3106  }
3107 
3108  }
3109  }
3110  }
3111 
3112  /*--- Correct the gradient values for any periodic boundaries. ---*/
3113 
3114  for (unsigned short iPeriodic = 1; iPeriodic <= config->GetnMarker_Periodic()/2; iPeriodic++) {
3115  if (weighted) {
3116  InitiatePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_SOL_LS);
3117  CompletePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_SOL_LS);
3118  } else {
3119  InitiatePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_SOL_ULS);
3120  CompletePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_SOL_ULS);
3121  }
3122  }
3123 
3124  /*--- Second loop over points of the grid to compute final gradient ---*/
3125 
3126  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
3127 
3128  /*--- Set the value of the singular ---*/
3129 
3130  singular = false;
3131 
3132  /*--- Entries of upper triangular matrix R ---*/
3133 
3134  r11 = 0.0; r12 = 0.0; r13 = 0.0; r22 = 0.0;
3135  r23 = 0.0; r23_a = 0.0; r23_b = 0.0; r33 = 0.0;
3136 
3137  r11 = base_nodes->GetRmatrix(iPoint,0,0);
3138  r12 = base_nodes->GetRmatrix(iPoint,0,1);
3139  r22 = base_nodes->GetRmatrix(iPoint,1,1);
3140 
3141  /*--- Entries of upper triangular matrix R ---*/
3142 
3143  if (r11 >= 0.0) r11 = sqrt(r11); else r11 = 0.0;
3144  if (r11 != 0.0) r12 = r12/r11; else r12 = 0.0;
3145  if (r22-r12*r12 >= 0.0) r22 = sqrt(r22-r12*r12); else r22 = 0.0;
3146 
3147  if (nDim == 3) {
3148  r13 = base_nodes->GetRmatrix(iPoint,0,2);
3149  r23_a = base_nodes->GetRmatrix(iPoint,1,2);
3150  r23_b = base_nodes->GetRmatrix(iPoint,2,1);
3151  r33 = base_nodes->GetRmatrix(iPoint,2,2);
3152 
3153  if (r11 != 0.0) r13 = r13/r11; else r13 = 0.0;
3154  if ((r22 != 0.0) && (r11*r22 != 0.0)) r23 = r23_a/r22 - r23_b*r12/(r11*r22); else r23 = 0.0;
3155  if (r33-r23*r23-r13*r13 >= 0.0) r33 = sqrt(r33-r23*r23-r13*r13); else r33 = 0.0;
3156  }
3157 
3158  /*--- Compute determinant ---*/
3159 
3160  if (nDim == 2) detR2 = (r11*r22)*(r11*r22);
3161  else detR2 = (r11*r22*r33)*(r11*r22*r33);
3162 
3163  /*--- Detect singular matrices ---*/
3164 
3165  if (abs(detR2) <= EPS) { detR2 = 1.0; singular = true; }
3166 
3167  /*--- S matrix := inv(R)*traspose(inv(R)) ---*/
3168 
3169  if (singular) {
3170  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3171  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
3172  Smatrix[iDim][jDim] = 0.0;
3173  }
3174  else {
3175  if (nDim == 2) {
3176  Smatrix[0][0] = (r12*r12+r22*r22)/detR2;
3177  Smatrix[0][1] = -r11*r12/detR2;
3178  Smatrix[1][0] = Smatrix[0][1];
3179  Smatrix[1][1] = r11*r11/detR2;
3180  }
3181  else {
3182  z11 = r22*r33; z12 = -r12*r33; z13 = r12*r23-r13*r22;
3183  z22 = r11*r33; z23 = -r11*r23; z33 = r11*r22;
3184  Smatrix[0][0] = (z11*z11+z12*z12+z13*z13)/detR2;
3185  Smatrix[0][1] = (z12*z22+z13*z23)/detR2;
3186  Smatrix[0][2] = (z13*z33)/detR2;
3187  Smatrix[1][0] = Smatrix[0][1];
3188  Smatrix[1][1] = (z22*z22+z23*z23)/detR2;
3189  Smatrix[1][2] = (z23*z33)/detR2;
3190  Smatrix[2][0] = Smatrix[0][2];
3191  Smatrix[2][1] = Smatrix[1][2];
3192  Smatrix[2][2] = (z33*z33)/detR2;
3193  }
3194  }
3195 
3196  /*--- Computation of the gradient: S*c ---*/
3197 
3198  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3199  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3200  Cvector[iVar][iDim] = 0.0;
3201  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++) {
3202  Cvector[iVar][iDim] += Smatrix[iDim][jDim]*base_nodes->GetGradient(iPoint, iVar, jDim);
3203  }
3204  }
3205  }
3206 
3207  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3208  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3209  if (reconstruction)
3210  base_nodes->SetGradient_Reconstruction(iPoint, iVar, iDim, Cvector[iVar][iDim]);
3211  else
3212  base_nodes->SetGradient(iPoint, iVar, iDim, Cvector[iVar][iDim]);
3213  }
3214  }
3215 
3216  }
3217 
3218  /*--- Gradient MPI ---*/
3219 
3220  InitiateComms(geometry, config, SOLUTION_GRADIENT);
3221  CompleteComms(geometry, config, SOLUTION_GRADIENT);
3222 
3223 }
3224 
3225 void CSolver::Add_External_To_Solution() {
3226  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
3227  base_nodes->AddSolution(iPoint, base_nodes->Get_External(iPoint));
3228  }
3229 }
3230 
3231 void CSolver::Add_Solution_To_External() {
3232  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
3233  base_nodes->Add_External(iPoint, base_nodes->GetSolution(iPoint));
3234  }
3235 }
3236 
3237 void CSolver::Update_Cross_Term(CConfig *config, su2passivematrix &cross_term) {
3238 
3239  /*--- This method is for discrete adjoint solvers and it is used in multi-physics
3240  * contexts, "cross_term" is the old value, the new one is in "Solution".
3241  * We update "cross_term" and the sum of all cross terms (in "External")
3242  * with a fraction of the difference between new and old.
3243  * When "alpha" is 1, i.e. no relaxation, we effectively subtract the old
3244  * value and add the new one to the total ("External"). ---*/
3245 
3246  passivedouble alpha = SU2_TYPE::GetValue(config->GetAitkenStatRelax());
3247 
3248  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
3249  for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3250  passivedouble
3251  new_val = SU2_TYPE::GetValue(base_nodes->GetSolution(iPoint,iVar)),
3252  delta = alpha * (new_val - cross_term(iPoint,iVar));
3253  /*--- Update cross term. ---*/
3254  cross_term(iPoint,iVar) += delta;
3255  Solution[iVar] = delta;
3256  }
3257  /*--- Update the sum of all cross-terms. ---*/
3258  base_nodes->Add_External(iPoint, Solution);
3259  }
3260 }
3261 
3262 void CSolver::SetGridVel_Gradient(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
3263  unsigned short iDim, jDim, iVar, iNeigh;
3264  unsigned long iPoint, jPoint;
3265  su2double *Coord_i, *Coord_j, *Solution_i, *Solution_j, Smatrix[3][3],
3266  r11, r12, r13, r22, r23, r23_a, r23_b, r33, weight, detR2, z11, z12, z13,
3267  z22, z23, z33, product;
3268  su2double **Cvector;
3269 
3270  /*--- Note that all nVar entries in this routine have been changed to nDim ---*/
3271  Cvector = new su2double* [nDim];
3272  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nDim; iVar++)
3273  Cvector[iVar] = new su2double [nDim];
3274 
3275  /*--- Loop over points of the grid ---*/
3276  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPointDomain(); iPoint++) {
3277 
3278  Coord_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
3279  Solution_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetGridVel();
3280 
3281  /*--- Inizialization of variables ---*/
3282  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nDim; iVar++)
3283  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3284  Cvector[iVar][iDim] = 0.0;
3285  r11 = 0.0; r12 = 0.0; r13 = 0.0; r22 = 0.0; r23 = 0.0; r23_a = 0.0; r23_b = 0.0; r33 = 0.0;
3286 
3287  for (iNeigh = 0; iNeigh < geometry->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNeigh++) {
3288  jPoint = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNeigh);
3289  Coord_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord();
3290  Solution_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetGridVel();
3291 
3292  weight = 0.0;
3293  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3294  weight += (Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim])*(Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim]);
3295 
3296  /*--- Sumations for entries of upper triangular matrix R ---*/
3297  r11 += (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])/(weight);
3298  r12 += (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])/(weight);
3299  r22 += (Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])*(Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])/(weight);
3300  if (nDim == 3) {
3301  r13 += (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/(weight);
3302  r23_a += (Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/(weight);
3303  r23_b += (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/(weight);
3304  r33 += (Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/(weight);
3305  }
3306 
3307  /*--- Entries of c:= transpose(A)*b ---*/
3308  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nDim; iVar++)
3309  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3310  Cvector[iVar][iDim] += (Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim])*(Solution_j[iVar]-Solution_i[iVar])/(weight);
3311  }
3312 
3313  /*--- Entries of upper triangular matrix R ---*/
3314  r11 = sqrt(r11);
3315  r12 = r12/(r11);
3316  r22 = sqrt(r22-r12*r12);
3317  if (nDim == 3) {
3318  r13 = r13/(r11);
3319  r23 = r23_a/(r22) - r23_b*r12/(r11*r22);
3320  r33 = sqrt(r33-r23*r23-r13*r13);
3321  }
3322  /*--- S matrix := inv(R)*traspose(inv(R)) ---*/
3323  if (nDim == 2) {
3324  detR2 = (r11*r22)*(r11*r22);
3325  Smatrix[0][0] = (r12*r12+r22*r22)/(detR2);
3326  Smatrix[0][1] = -r11*r12/(detR2);
3327  Smatrix[1][0] = Smatrix[0][1];
3328  Smatrix[1][1] = r11*r11/(detR2);
3329  }
3330  else {
3331  detR2 = (r11*r22*r33)*(r11*r22*r33);
3332  z11 = r22*r33;
3333  z12 = -r12*r33;
3334  z13 = r12*r23-r13*r22;
3335  z22 = r11*r33;
3336  z23 = -r11*r23;
3337  z33 = r11*r22;
3338  Smatrix[0][0] = (z11*z11+z12*z12+z13*z13)/(detR2);
3339  Smatrix[0][1] = (z12*z22+z13*z23)/(detR2);
3340  Smatrix[0][2] = (z13*z33)/(detR2);
3341  Smatrix[1][0] = Smatrix[0][1];
3342  Smatrix[1][1] = (z22*z22+z23*z23)/(detR2);
3343  Smatrix[1][2] = (z23*z33)/(detR2);
3344  Smatrix[2][0] = Smatrix[0][2];
3345  Smatrix[2][1] = Smatrix[1][2];
3346  Smatrix[2][2] = (z33*z33)/(detR2);
3347  }
3348  /*--- Computation of the gradient: S*c ---*/
3349  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nDim; iVar++) {
3350  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3351  product = 0.0;
3352  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
3353  product += Smatrix[iDim][jDim]*Cvector[iVar][jDim];
3354  geometry->node[iPoint]->SetGridVel_Grad(iVar, iDim, product);
3355  }
3356  }
3357  }
3358 
3359  /*--- Deallocate memory ---*/
3360  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nDim; iVar++)
3361  delete [] Cvector[iVar];
3362  delete [] Cvector;
3363 
3364 }
3365 
3366 void CSolver::SetAuxVar_Surface_Gradient(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
3367 
3368  unsigned short iDim, jDim, iNeigh, iMarker, Boundary;
3369  unsigned short nDim = geometry->GetnDim();
3370  unsigned long iPoint, jPoint, iVertex;
3371  su2double *Coord_i, *Coord_j, AuxVar_i, AuxVar_j;
3372  su2double **Smatrix, *Cvector;
3373 
3374  Smatrix = new su2double* [nDim];
3375  Cvector = new su2double [nDim];
3376  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3377  Smatrix[iDim] = new su2double [nDim];
3378 
3379 
3380  /*--- Loop over boundary markers to select those for Euler or NS walls ---*/
3381  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3382  Boundary = config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker);
3383  switch (Boundary) {
3384  case EULER_WALL:
3385  case HEAT_FLUX:
3386  case ISOTHERMAL:
3387  case CHT_WALL_INTERFACE:
3388 
3389  /*--- Loop over points on the surface (Least-Squares approximation) ---*/
3390  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3391  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3392  if (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetDomain()) {
3393  Coord_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
3394  AuxVar_i = base_nodes->GetAuxVar(iPoint);
3395 
3396  /*--- Inizialization of variables ---*/
3397  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3398  Cvector[iDim] = 0.0;
3399  su2double r11 = 0.0, r12 = 0.0, r13 = 0.0, r22 = 0.0, r23 = 0.0, r23_a = 0.0, r23_b = 0.0, r33 = 0.0;
3400 
3401  for (iNeigh = 0; iNeigh < geometry->node[iPoint]->GetnPoint(); iNeigh++) {
3402  jPoint = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetPoint(iNeigh);
3403  Coord_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord();
3404  AuxVar_j = base_nodes->GetAuxVar(jPoint);
3405 
3406  su2double weight = 0;
3407  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3408  weight += (Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim])*(Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim]);
3409 
3410  /*--- Sumations for entries of upper triangular matrix R ---*/
3411  r11 += (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])/weight;
3412  r12 += (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])/weight;
3413  r22 += (Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])*(Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])/weight;
3414  if (nDim == 3) {
3415  r13 += (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/weight;
3416  r23_a += (Coord_j[1]-Coord_i[1])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/weight;
3417  r23_b += (Coord_j[0]-Coord_i[0])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/weight;
3418  r33 += (Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])*(Coord_j[2]-Coord_i[2])/weight;
3419  }
3420 
3421  /*--- Entries of c:= transpose(A)*b ---*/
3422  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3423  Cvector[iDim] += (Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim])*(AuxVar_j-AuxVar_i)/weight;
3424  }
3425 
3426  /*--- Entries of upper triangular matrix R ---*/
3427  r11 = sqrt(r11);
3428  r12 = r12/r11;
3429  r22 = sqrt(r22-r12*r12);
3430  if (nDim == 3) {
3431  r13 = r13/r11;
3432  r23 = r23_a/r22 - r23_b*r12/(r11*r22);
3433  r33 = sqrt(r33-r23*r23-r13*r13);
3434  }
3435  /*--- S matrix := inv(R)*traspose(inv(R)) ---*/
3436  if (nDim == 2) {
3437  su2double detR2 = (r11*r22)*(r11*r22);
3438  Smatrix[0][0] = (r12*r12+r22*r22)/detR2;
3439  Smatrix[0][1] = -r11*r12/detR2;
3440  Smatrix[1][0] = Smatrix[0][1];
3441  Smatrix[1][1] = r11*r11/detR2;
3442  }
3443  else {
3444  su2double detR2 = (r11*r22*r33)*(r11*r22*r33);
3445  su2double z11, z12, z13, z22, z23, z33; // aux vars
3446  z11 = r22*r33;
3447  z12 = -r12*r33;
3448  z13 = r12*r23-r13*r22;
3449  z22 = r11*r33;
3450  z23 = -r11*r23;
3451  z33 = r11*r22;
3452  Smatrix[0][0] = (z11*z11+z12*z12+z13*z13)/detR2;
3453  Smatrix[0][1] = (z12*z22+z13*z23)/detR2;
3454  Smatrix[0][2] = (z13*z33)/detR2;
3455  Smatrix[1][0] = Smatrix[0][1];
3456  Smatrix[1][1] = (z22*z22+z23*z23)/detR2;
3457  Smatrix[1][2] = (z23*z33)/detR2;
3458  Smatrix[2][0] = Smatrix[0][2];
3459  Smatrix[2][1] = Smatrix[1][2];
3460  Smatrix[2][2] = (z33*z33)/detR2;
3461  }
3462  /*--- Computation of the gradient: S*c ---*/
3463  su2double product;
3464  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3465  product = 0.0;
3466  for (jDim = 0; jDim < nDim; jDim++)
3467  product += Smatrix[iDim][jDim]*Cvector[jDim];
3468  base_nodes->SetAuxVarGradient(iPoint, iDim, product);
3469  }
3470  }
3471  } /*--- End of loop over surface points ---*/
3472  break;
3473  default:
3474  break;
3475  }
3476  }
3477 
3478  /*--- Memory deallocation ---*/
3479  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3480  delete [] Smatrix[iDim];
3481  delete [] Cvector;
3482  delete [] Smatrix;
3483 }
3484 
3485 void CSolver::SetSolution_Limiter(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
3486 
3487  unsigned long iEdge, iPoint, jPoint;
3488  unsigned short iVar, iDim;
3489  su2double **Gradient_i, **Gradient_j, *Coord_i, *Coord_j,
3490  *Solution, *Solution_i, *Solution_j,
3491  *LocalMinSolution = NULL, *LocalMaxSolution = NULL,
3492  *GlobalMinSolution = NULL, *GlobalMaxSolution = NULL,
3493  dave, LimK, eps1, eps2, dm, dp, du, ds, y, limiter, SharpEdge_Distance;
3494 
3495 #ifdef CODI_REVERSE_TYPE
3496  bool TapeActive = false;
3497 
3498  if (config->GetDiscrete_Adjoint() && config->GetFrozen_Limiter_Disc()) {
3499  /*--- If limiters are frozen do not record the computation ---*/
3500  TapeActive = AD::globalTape.isActive();
3501  AD::StopRecording();
3502  }
3503 #endif
3504 
3505  dave = config->GetRefElemLength();
3506  LimK = config->GetVenkat_LimiterCoeff();
3507 
3508  if (config->GetKind_SlopeLimit() == NO_LIMITER) {
3509 
3510  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
3511  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3512  base_nodes->SetLimiter(iPoint, iVar, 1.0);
3513  }
3514  }
3515 
3516  }
3517 
3518  else {
3519 
3520  /*--- Initialize solution max and solution min and the limiter in the entire domain --*/
3521 
3522  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
3523  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3524  base_nodes->SetSolution_Max(iPoint, iVar, -EPS);
3525  base_nodes->SetSolution_Min(iPoint, iVar, EPS);
3526  base_nodes->SetLimiter(iPoint, iVar, 2.0);
3527  }
3528  }
3529 
3530  /*--- Establish bounds for Spekreijse monotonicity by finding max & min values of neighbor variables --*/
3531 
3532  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
3533 
3534  /*--- Point identification, Normal vector and area ---*/
3535 
3536  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
3537  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
3538 
3539  /*--- Get the conserved variables ---*/
3540 
3541  Solution_i = base_nodes->GetSolution(iPoint);
3542  Solution_j = base_nodes->GetSolution(jPoint);
3543 
3544  /*--- Compute the maximum, and minimum values for nodes i & j ---*/
3545 
3546  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3547  du = (Solution_j[iVar] - Solution_i[iVar]);
3548  base_nodes->SetSolution_Min(iPoint, iVar, min(base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(iPoint, iVar), du));
3549  base_nodes->SetSolution_Max(iPoint, iVar, max(base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(iPoint, iVar), du));
3550  base_nodes->SetSolution_Min(jPoint, iVar, min(base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(jPoint, iVar), -du));
3551  base_nodes->SetSolution_Max(jPoint, iVar, max(base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(jPoint, iVar), -du));
3552  }
3553 
3554  }
3555 
3556  /*--- Correct the limiter values across any periodic boundaries. ---*/
3557 
3558  for (unsigned short iPeriodic = 1; iPeriodic <= config->GetnMarker_Periodic()/2; iPeriodic++) {
3559  InitiatePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_LIM_SOL_1);
3560  CompletePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_LIM_SOL_1);
3561  }
3562 
3563  }
3564 
3565  /*--- Barth-Jespersen limiter with Venkatakrishnan modification ---*/
3566 
3567  if (config->GetKind_SlopeLimit_Flow() == BARTH_JESPERSEN) {
3568 
3569  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
3570 
3571  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
3572  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
3573  Gradient_i = base_nodes->GetGradient_Reconstruction(iPoint);
3574  Gradient_j = base_nodes->GetGradient_Reconstruction(jPoint);
3575  Coord_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
3576  Coord_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord();
3577 
3578  AD::StartPreacc();
3579  AD::SetPreaccIn(Gradient_i, nVar, nDim);
3580  AD::SetPreaccIn(Gradient_j, nVar, nDim);
3581  AD::SetPreaccIn(Coord_i, nDim); AD::SetPreaccIn(Coord_j, nDim);
3582 
3583  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3584 
3585  AD::SetPreaccIn(base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(iPoint, iVar));
3586  AD::SetPreaccIn(base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(iPoint, iVar));
3587  AD::SetPreaccIn(base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(jPoint,iVar));
3588  AD::SetPreaccIn(base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(jPoint,iVar));
3589 
3590  /*--- Calculate the interface left gradient, delta- (dm) ---*/
3591 
3592  dm = 0.0;
3593  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3594  dm += 0.5*(Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim])*Gradient_i[iVar][iDim];
3595 
3596  if (dm == 0.0) { limiter = 2.0; }
3597  else {
3598  if ( dm > 0.0 ) dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(iPoint, iVar);
3599  else dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(iPoint, iVar);
3600  limiter = dp/dm;
3601  }
3602 
3603  if (limiter < base_nodes->GetLimiter(iPoint, iVar)) {
3604  base_nodes->SetLimiter(iPoint, iVar, limiter);
3605  AD::SetPreaccOut(base_nodes->GetLimiter(iPoint)[iVar]);
3606  }
3607 
3608  /*--- Calculate the interface right gradient, delta+ (dp) ---*/
3609 
3610  dm = 0.0;
3611  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3612  dm += 0.5*(Coord_i[iDim]-Coord_j[iDim])*Gradient_j[iVar][iDim];
3613 
3614  if (dm == 0.0) { limiter = 2.0; }
3615  else {
3616  if ( dm > 0.0 ) dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(jPoint,iVar);
3617  else dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(jPoint,iVar);
3618  limiter = dp/dm;
3619  }
3620 
3621  if (limiter < base_nodes->GetLimiter(jPoint,iVar)) {
3622  base_nodes->SetLimiter(jPoint,iVar, limiter);
3623  AD::SetPreaccOut(base_nodes->GetLimiter(jPoint)[iVar]);
3624  }
3625 
3626  }
3627 
3628  AD::EndPreacc();
3629 
3630  }
3631 
3632 
3633  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
3634  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3635  y = base_nodes->GetLimiter(iPoint, iVar);
3636  limiter = (y*y + 2.0*y) / (y*y + y + 2.0);
3637  base_nodes->SetLimiter(iPoint, iVar, limiter);
3638  }
3639  }
3640 
3641  }
3642 
3643  /*--- Venkatakrishnan limiter ---*/
3644 
3645  if ((config->GetKind_SlopeLimit() == VENKATAKRISHNAN) || (config->GetKind_SlopeLimit_Flow() == VENKATAKRISHNAN_WANG)) {
3646 
3647  if (config->GetKind_SlopeLimit_Flow() == VENKATAKRISHNAN_WANG) {
3648 
3649  /*--- Allocate memory for the max and min solution value --*/
3650 
3651  LocalMinSolution = new su2double [nVar]; GlobalMinSolution = new su2double [nVar];
3652  LocalMaxSolution = new su2double [nVar]; GlobalMaxSolution = new su2double [nVar];
3653 
3654  /*--- Compute the max value and min value of the solution ---*/
3655 
3656  Solution = base_nodes->GetSolution(iPoint);
3657  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3658  LocalMinSolution[iVar] = Solution[iVar];
3659  LocalMaxSolution[iVar] = Solution[iVar];
3660  }
3661 
3662  for (iPoint = 0; iPoint < geometry->GetnPoint(); iPoint++) {
3663 
3664  /*--- Get the solution variables ---*/
3665 
3666  Solution = base_nodes->GetSolution(iPoint);
3667 
3668  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3669  LocalMinSolution[iVar] = min (LocalMinSolution[iVar], Solution[iVar]);
3670  LocalMaxSolution[iVar] = max (LocalMaxSolution[iVar], Solution[iVar]);
3671  }
3672 
3673  }
3674 
3675 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
3676  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(LocalMinSolution, GlobalMinSolution, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MIN, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3677  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(LocalMaxSolution, GlobalMaxSolution, nVar, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
3678 #else
3679  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3680  GlobalMinSolution[iVar] = LocalMinSolution[iVar];
3681  GlobalMaxSolution[iVar] = LocalMaxSolution[iVar];
3682  }
3683 #endif
3684  }
3685 
3686  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
3687 
3688  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
3689  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
3690  Gradient_i = base_nodes->GetGradient_Reconstruction(iPoint);
3691  Gradient_j = base_nodes->GetGradient_Reconstruction(jPoint);
3692  Coord_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
3693  Coord_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord();
3694 
3695  AD::StartPreacc();
3696  AD::SetPreaccIn(Gradient_i, nVar, nDim);
3697  AD::SetPreaccIn(Gradient_j, nVar, nDim);
3698  AD::SetPreaccIn(Coord_i, nDim); AD::SetPreaccIn(Coord_j, nDim);
3699 
3700  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3701 
3702  AD::StartPreacc();
3703  AD::SetPreaccIn(Gradient_i[iVar], nDim);
3704  AD::SetPreaccIn(Gradient_j[iVar], nDim);
3705  AD::SetPreaccIn(Coord_i, nDim);
3706  AD::SetPreaccIn(Coord_j, nDim);
3707  AD::SetPreaccIn(base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(iPoint, iVar));
3708  AD::SetPreaccIn(base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(iPoint, iVar));
3709  AD::SetPreaccIn(base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(jPoint,iVar));
3710  AD::SetPreaccIn(base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(jPoint,iVar));
3711 
3712  if (config->GetKind_SlopeLimit_Flow() == VENKATAKRISHNAN_WANG) {
3713  AD::SetPreaccIn(GlobalMaxSolution[iVar]);
3714  AD::SetPreaccIn(GlobalMinSolution[iVar]);
3715  eps1 = LimK * (GlobalMaxSolution[iVar] - GlobalMinSolution[iVar]);
3716  eps2 = eps1*eps1;
3717  }
3718  else {
3719  eps1 = LimK*dave;
3720  eps2 = eps1*eps1*eps1;
3721  }
3722 
3723  /*--- Calculate the interface left gradient, delta- (dm) ---*/
3724 
3725  dm = 0.0;
3726  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3727  dm += 0.5*(Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim])*Gradient_i[iVar][iDim];
3728 
3729  /*--- Calculate the interface right gradient, delta+ (dp) ---*/
3730 
3731  if ( dm > 0.0 ) dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(iPoint, iVar);
3732  else dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(iPoint, iVar);
3733 
3734  limiter = ( dp*dp + 2.0*dp*dm + eps2 )/( dp*dp + dp*dm + 2.0*dm*dm + eps2);
3735 
3736  if (limiter < base_nodes->GetLimiter(iPoint, iVar)) {
3737  base_nodes->SetLimiter(iPoint, iVar, limiter);
3738  AD::SetPreaccOut(base_nodes->GetLimiter(iPoint)[iVar]);
3739  }
3740 
3741  /*-- Repeat for point j on the edge ---*/
3742 
3743  dm = 0.0;
3744  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3745  dm += 0.5*(Coord_i[iDim]-Coord_j[iDim])*Gradient_j[iVar][iDim];
3746 
3747  if ( dm > 0.0 ) dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(jPoint,iVar);
3748  else dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(jPoint,iVar);
3749 
3750  limiter = ( dp*dp + 2.0*dp*dm + eps2 )/( dp*dp + dp*dm + 2.0*dm*dm + eps2);
3751 
3752  if (limiter < base_nodes->GetLimiter(jPoint,iVar)) {
3753  base_nodes->SetLimiter(jPoint,iVar, limiter);
3754  AD::SetPreaccOut(base_nodes->GetLimiter(jPoint)[iVar]);
3755  }
3756 
3757  AD::EndPreacc();
3758  }
3759  }
3760 
3761  if (LocalMinSolution != NULL) delete [] LocalMinSolution;
3762  if (LocalMaxSolution != NULL) delete [] LocalMaxSolution;
3763  if (GlobalMinSolution != NULL) delete [] GlobalMinSolution;
3764  if (GlobalMaxSolution != NULL) delete [] GlobalMaxSolution;
3765 
3766  }
3767 
3768  /*--- Sharp edges limiter ---*/
3769 
3770  if (config->GetKind_SlopeLimit() == SHARP_EDGES) {
3771 
3772  /*-- Get limiter parameters from the configuration file ---*/
3773 
3774  dave = config->GetRefElemLength();
3775  LimK = config->GetVenkat_LimiterCoeff();
3776  eps1 = LimK*dave;
3777  eps2 = eps1*eps1*eps1;
3778 
3779  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
3780 
3781  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
3782  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
3783  Gradient_i = base_nodes->GetGradient_Reconstruction(iPoint);
3784  Gradient_j = base_nodes->GetGradient_Reconstruction(jPoint);
3785  Coord_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
3786  Coord_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord();
3787 
3788  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3789 
3790  /*--- Calculate the interface left gradient, delta- (dm) ---*/
3791 
3792  dm = 0.0;
3793  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3794  dm += 0.5*(Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim])*Gradient_i[iVar][iDim];
3795 
3796  /*--- Calculate the interface right gradient, delta+ (dp) ---*/
3797 
3798  if ( dm > 0.0 ) dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(iPoint, iVar);
3799  else dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(iPoint, iVar);
3800 
3801  /*--- Compute the distance to a sharp edge ---*/
3802 
3803  SharpEdge_Distance = (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetSharpEdge_Distance() - config->GetAdjSharp_LimiterCoeff()*eps1);
3804  ds = 0.0;
3805  if (SharpEdge_Distance < -eps1) ds = 0.0;
3806  if (fabs(SharpEdge_Distance) <= eps1) ds = 0.5*(1.0+(SharpEdge_Distance/eps1)+(1.0/PI_NUMBER)*sin(PI_NUMBER*SharpEdge_Distance/eps1));
3807  if (SharpEdge_Distance > eps1) ds = 1.0;
3808 
3809  limiter = ds * ( dp*dp + 2.0*dp*dm + eps2 )/( dp*dp + dp*dm + 2.0*dm*dm + eps2);
3810 
3811  if (limiter < base_nodes->GetLimiter(iPoint, iVar))
3812  base_nodes->SetLimiter(iPoint, iVar, limiter);
3813 
3814  /*-- Repeat for point j on the edge ---*/
3815 
3816  dm = 0.0;
3817  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3818  dm += 0.5*(Coord_i[iDim]-Coord_j[iDim])*Gradient_j[iVar][iDim];
3819 
3820  if ( dm > 0.0 ) dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(jPoint,iVar);
3821  else dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(jPoint,iVar);
3822 
3823  /*--- Compute the distance to a sharp edge ---*/
3824 
3825  SharpEdge_Distance = (geometry->node[jPoint]->GetSharpEdge_Distance() - config->GetAdjSharp_LimiterCoeff()*eps1);
3826  ds = 0.0;
3827  if (SharpEdge_Distance < -eps1) ds = 0.0;
3828  if (fabs(SharpEdge_Distance) <= eps1) ds = 0.5*(1.0+(SharpEdge_Distance/eps1)+(1.0/PI_NUMBER)*sin(PI_NUMBER*SharpEdge_Distance/eps1));
3829  if (SharpEdge_Distance > eps1) ds = 1.0;
3830 
3831  limiter = ds * ( dp*dp + 2.0*dp*dm + eps2 )/( dp*dp + dp*dm + 2.0*dm*dm + eps2);
3832 
3833  if (limiter < base_nodes->GetLimiter(jPoint,iVar))
3834  base_nodes->SetLimiter(jPoint,iVar, limiter);
3835 
3836  }
3837  }
3838  }
3839 
3840  /*--- Sharp edges limiter ---*/
3841 
3842  if (config->GetKind_SlopeLimit() == WALL_DISTANCE) {
3843 
3844  /*-- Get limiter parameters from the configuration file ---*/
3845 
3846  dave = config->GetRefElemLength();
3847  LimK = config->GetVenkat_LimiterCoeff();
3848  eps1 = LimK*dave;
3849  eps2 = eps1*eps1*eps1;
3850 
3851  for (iEdge = 0; iEdge < geometry->GetnEdge(); iEdge++) {
3852 
3853  iPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(0);
3854  jPoint = geometry->edge[iEdge]->GetNode(1);
3855  Gradient_i = base_nodes->GetGradient_Reconstruction(iPoint);
3856  Gradient_j = base_nodes->GetGradient_Reconstruction(jPoint);
3857  Coord_i = geometry->node[iPoint]->GetCoord();
3858  Coord_j = geometry->node[jPoint]->GetCoord();
3859 
3860  for (iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
3861 
3862  /*--- Calculate the interface left gradient, delta- (dm) ---*/
3863 
3864  dm = 0.0;
3865  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3866  dm += 0.5*(Coord_j[iDim]-Coord_i[iDim])*Gradient_i[iVar][iDim];
3867 
3868  /*--- Calculate the interface right gradient, delta+ (dp) ---*/
3869 
3870  if ( dm > 0.0 ) dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(iPoint, iVar);
3871  else dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(iPoint, iVar);
3872 
3873  /*--- Compute the distance to a sharp edge ---*/
3874 
3875  SharpEdge_Distance = (geometry->node[iPoint]->GetWall_Distance() - config->GetAdjSharp_LimiterCoeff()*eps1);
3876  ds = 0.0;
3877  if (SharpEdge_Distance < -eps1) ds = 0.0;
3878  if (fabs(SharpEdge_Distance) <= eps1) ds = 0.5*(1.0+(SharpEdge_Distance/eps1)+(1.0/PI_NUMBER)*sin(PI_NUMBER*SharpEdge_Distance/eps1));
3879  if (SharpEdge_Distance > eps1) ds = 1.0;
3880 
3881  limiter = ds * ( dp*dp + 2.0*dp*dm + eps2 )/( dp*dp + dp*dm + 2.0*dm*dm + eps2);
3882 
3883  if (limiter < base_nodes->GetLimiter(iPoint, iVar))
3884  base_nodes->SetLimiter(iPoint, iVar, limiter);
3885 
3886  /*-- Repeat for point j on the edge ---*/
3887 
3888  dm = 0.0;
3889  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3890  dm += 0.5*(Coord_i[iDim]-Coord_j[iDim])*Gradient_j[iVar][iDim];
3891 
3892  if ( dm > 0.0 ) dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Max(jPoint,iVar);
3893  else dp = base_nodes->GetSolution_Min(jPoint,iVar);
3894 
3895  /*--- Compute the distance to a sharp edge ---*/
3896 
3897  SharpEdge_Distance = (geometry->node[jPoint]->GetWall_Distance() - config->GetAdjSharp_LimiterCoeff()*eps1);
3898  ds = 0.0;
3899  if (SharpEdge_Distance < -eps1) ds = 0.0;
3900  if (fabs(SharpEdge_Distance) <= eps1) ds = 0.5*(1.0+(SharpEdge_Distance/eps1)+(1.0/PI_NUMBER)*sin(PI_NUMBER*SharpEdge_Distance/eps1));
3901  if (SharpEdge_Distance > eps1) ds = 1.0;
3902 
3903  limiter = ds * ( dp*dp + 2.0*dp*dm + eps2 )/( dp*dp + dp*dm + 2.0*dm*dm + eps2);
3904 
3905  if (limiter < base_nodes->GetLimiter(jPoint,iVar))
3906  base_nodes->SetLimiter(jPoint,iVar, limiter);
3907 
3908  }
3909  }
3910  }
3911 
3912  /*--- Correct the limiter values across any periodic boundaries. ---*/
3913 
3914  for (unsigned short iPeriodic = 1; iPeriodic <= config->GetnMarker_Periodic()/2; iPeriodic++) {
3915  InitiatePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_LIM_SOL_2);
3916  CompletePeriodicComms(geometry, config, iPeriodic, PERIODIC_LIM_SOL_2);
3917  }
3918 
3919  /*--- Limiter MPI ---*/
3920 
3921  InitiateComms(geometry, config, SOLUTION_LIMITER);
3922  CompleteComms(geometry, config, SOLUTION_LIMITER);
3923 
3924 #ifdef CODI_REVERSE_TYPE
3925  if (TapeActive) AD::StartRecording();
3926 #endif
3927 }
3928 
3929 void CSolver::Gauss_Elimination(su2double** A, su2double* rhs, unsigned short nVar) {
3930 
3931  short iVar, jVar, kVar;
3932  su2double weight, aux;
3933 
3934  if (nVar == 1)
3935  rhs[0] /= A[0][0];
3936  else {
3937 
3938  /*--- Transform system in Upper Matrix ---*/
3939 
3940  for (iVar = 1; iVar < (short)nVar; iVar++) {
3941  for (jVar = 0; jVar < iVar; jVar++) {
3942  weight = A[iVar][jVar]/A[jVar][jVar];
3943  for (kVar = jVar; kVar < (short)nVar; kVar++)
3944  A[iVar][kVar] -= weight*A[jVar][kVar];
3945  rhs[iVar] -= weight*rhs[jVar];
3946  }
3947  }
3948 
3949  /*--- Backwards substitution ---*/
3950 
3951  rhs[nVar-1] = rhs[nVar-1]/A[nVar-1][nVar-1];
3952  for (iVar = (short)nVar-2; iVar >= 0; iVar--) {
3953  aux = 0;
3954  for (jVar = iVar+1; jVar < (short)nVar; jVar++)
3955  aux += A[iVar][jVar]*rhs[jVar];
3956  rhs[iVar] = (rhs[iVar]-aux)/A[iVar][iVar];
3957  if (iVar == 0) break;
3958  }
3959  }
3960 
3961 }
3962 
3963 void CSolver::Aeroelastic(CSurfaceMovement *surface_movement, CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned long TimeIter) {
3964 
3965  /*--- Variables used for Aeroelastic case ---*/
3966 
3967  su2double Cl, Cd, Cn, Ct, Cm, Cn_rot;
3968  su2double Alpha = config->GetAoA()*PI_NUMBER/180.0;
3969  vector<su2double> structural_solution(4,0.0); //contains solution(displacements and rates) of typical section wing model.
3970 
3971  unsigned short iMarker, iMarker_Monitoring, Monitoring;
3972  string Marker_Tag, Monitoring_Tag;
3973 
3974  /*--- Loop over markers and find the ones being monitored. ---*/
3975 
3976  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3977  Monitoring = config->GetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker);
3978  if (Monitoring == YES) {
3979 
3980  /*--- Find the particular marker being monitored and get the forces acting on it. ---*/
3981 
3982  for (iMarker_Monitoring = 0; iMarker_Monitoring < config->GetnMarker_Monitoring(); iMarker_Monitoring++) {
3983  Monitoring_Tag = config->GetMarker_Monitoring_TagBound(iMarker_Monitoring);
3984  Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
3985  if (Marker_Tag == Monitoring_Tag) {
3986 
3987  Cl = GetSurface_CL(iMarker_Monitoring);
3988  Cd = GetSurface_CD(iMarker_Monitoring);
3989 
3990  /*--- For typical section wing model want the force normal to the airfoil (in the direction of the spring) ---*/
3991  Cn = Cl*cos(Alpha) + Cd*sin(Alpha);
3992  Ct = -Cl*sin(Alpha) + Cd*cos(Alpha);
3993 
3994  Cm = GetSurface_CMz(iMarker_Monitoring);
3995 
3996  /*--- Calculate forces for the Typical Section Wing Model taking into account rotation ---*/
3997 
3998  /*--- Note that the calculation of the forces and the subsequent displacements ...
3999  is only correct for the airfoil that starts at the 0 degree position ---*/
4000 
4001  if (config->GetKind_GridMovement() == AEROELASTIC_RIGID_MOTION) {
4002  su2double Omega, dt, psi;
4003  dt = config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
4004  Omega = (config->GetRotation_Rate(2)/config->GetOmega_Ref());
4005  psi = Omega*(dt*TimeIter);
4006 
4007  /*--- Correct for the airfoil starting position (This is hardcoded in here) ---*/
4008  if (Monitoring_Tag == "Airfoil1") {
4009  psi = psi + 0.0;
4010  }
4011  else if (Monitoring_Tag == "Airfoil2") {
4012  psi = psi + 2.0/3.0*PI_NUMBER;
4013  }
4014  else if (Monitoring_Tag == "Airfoil3") {
4015  psi = psi + 4.0/3.0*PI_NUMBER;
4016  }
4017  else
4018  cout << "WARNING: There is a marker that we are monitoring that doesn't match the values hardcoded above!" << endl;
4019 
4020  cout << Monitoring_Tag << " position " << psi*180.0/PI_NUMBER << " degrees. " << endl;
4021 
4022  Cn_rot = Cn*cos(psi) - Ct*sin(psi); //Note the signs are different for accounting for the AOA.
4023  Cn = Cn_rot;
4024  }
4025 
4026  /*--- Solve the aeroelastic equations for the particular marker(surface) ---*/
4027 
4028  SolveTypicalSectionWingModel(geometry, Cn, Cm, config, iMarker_Monitoring, structural_solution);
4029 
4030  break;
4031  }
4032  }
4033 
4034  /*--- Compute the new surface node locations ---*/
4035  surface_movement->AeroelasticDeform(geometry, config, TimeIter, iMarker, iMarker_Monitoring, structural_solution);
4036 
4037  }
4038 
4039  }
4040 
4041 }
4042 
4043 void CSolver::SetUpTypicalSectionWingModel(vector<vector<su2double> >& Phi, vector<su2double>& omega, CConfig *config) {
4044 
4045  /*--- Retrieve values from the config file ---*/
4046  su2double w_h = config->GetAeroelastic_Frequency_Plunge();
4047  su2double w_a = config->GetAeroelastic_Frequency_Pitch();
4048  su2double x_a = config->GetAeroelastic_CG_Location();
4049  su2double r_a = sqrt(config->GetAeroelastic_Radius_Gyration_Squared());
4050  su2double w = w_h/w_a;
4051 
4052  // Mass Matrix
4053  vector<vector<su2double> > M(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
4054  M[0][0] = 1;
4055  M[0][1] = x_a;
4056  M[1][0] = x_a;
4057  M[1][1] = r_a*r_a;
4058 
4059  // Stiffness Matrix
4060  // vector<vector<su2double> > K(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
4061  // K[0][0] = (w_h/w_a)*(w_h/w_a);
4062  // K[0][1] = 0.0;
4063  // K[1][0] = 0.0;
4064  // K[1][1] = r_a*r_a;
4065 
4066  /* Eigenvector and Eigenvalue Matrices of the Generalized EigenValue Problem. */
4067 
4068  vector<vector<su2double> > Omega2(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
4069  su2double aux; // auxiliary variable
4070  aux = sqrt(pow(r_a,2)*pow(w,4) - 2*pow(r_a,2)*pow(w,2) + pow(r_a,2) + 4*pow(x_a,2)*pow(w,2));
4071  Phi[0][0] = (r_a * (r_a - r_a*pow(w,2) + aux)) / (2*x_a*pow(w, 2));
4072  Phi[0][1] = (r_a * (r_a - r_a*pow(w,2) - aux)) / (2*x_a*pow(w, 2));
4073  Phi[1][0] = 1.0;
4074  Phi[1][1] = 1.0;
4075 
4076  Omega2[0][0] = (r_a * (r_a + r_a*pow(w,2) - aux)) / (2*(pow(r_a, 2) - pow(x_a, 2)));
4077  Omega2[0][1] = 0;
4078  Omega2[1][0] = 0;
4079  Omega2[1][1] = (r_a * (r_a + r_a*pow(w,2) + aux)) / (2*(pow(r_a, 2) - pow(x_a, 2)));
4080 
4081  /* Nondimesionalize the Eigenvectors such that Phi'*M*Phi = I and PHI'*K*PHI = Omega */
4082  // Phi'*M*Phi = D
4083  // D^(-1/2)*Phi'*M*Phi*D^(-1/2) = D^(-1/2)*D^(1/2)*D^(1/2)*D^(-1/2) = I, D^(-1/2) = inv(sqrt(D))
4084  // Phi = Phi*D^(-1/2)
4085 
4086  vector<vector<su2double> > Aux(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
4087  vector<vector<su2double> > D(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
4088  // Aux = M*Phi
4089  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
4090  for (int j=0; j<2; j++) {
4091  Aux[i][j] = 0;
4092  for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
4093  Aux[i][j] += M[i][k]*Phi[k][j];
4094  }
4095  }
4096  }
4097 
4098  // D = Phi'*Aux
4099  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
4100  for (int j=0; j<2; j++) {
4101  D[i][j] = 0;
4102  for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
4103  D[i][j] += Phi[k][i]*Aux[k][j]; //PHI transpose
4104  }
4105  }
4106  }
4107 
4108  //Modify the first column
4109  Phi[0][0] = Phi[0][0] * 1/sqrt(D[0][0]);
4110  Phi[1][0] = Phi[1][0] * 1/sqrt(D[0][0]);
4111  //Modify the second column
4112  Phi[0][1] = Phi[0][1] * 1/sqrt(D[1][1]);
4113  Phi[1][1] = Phi[1][1] * 1/sqrt(D[1][1]);
4114 
4115  // Sqrt of the eigenvalues (frequency of vibration of the modes)
4116  omega[0] = sqrt(Omega2[0][0]);
4117  omega[1] = sqrt(Omega2[1][1]);
4118 
4119 }
4120 
4121 void CSolver::SolveTypicalSectionWingModel(CGeometry *geometry, su2double Cl, su2double Cm, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMarker, vector<su2double>& displacements) {
4122 
4123  /*--- The aeroelastic model solved in this routine is the typical section wing model
4124  The details of the implementation are similar to those found in J.J. Alonso
4125  "Fully-Implicit Time-Marching Aeroelastic Solutions" 1994. ---*/
4126 
4127  /*--- Retrieve values from the config file ---*/
4128  su2double w_alpha = config->GetAeroelastic_Frequency_Pitch();
4129  su2double vf = config->GetAeroelastic_Flutter_Speed_Index();
4130  su2double b = config->GetLength_Reynolds()/2.0; // airfoil semichord, Reynolds length is by defaul 1.0
4131  su2double dt = config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
4132  dt = dt*w_alpha; //Non-dimensionalize the structural time.
4133 
4134  /*--- Structural Equation damping ---*/
4135  vector<su2double> xi(2,0.0);
4136 
4137  /*--- Eigenvectors and Eigenvalues of the Generalized EigenValue Problem. ---*/
4138  vector<vector<su2double> > Phi(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0)); // generalized eigenvectors.
4139  vector<su2double> w(2,0.0); // sqrt of the generalized eigenvalues (frequency of vibration of the modes).
4140  SetUpTypicalSectionWingModel(Phi, w, config);
4141 
4142  /*--- Solving the Decoupled Aeroelastic Problem with second order time discretization Eq (9) ---*/
4143 
4144  /*--- Solution variables description. //x[j][i], j-entry, i-equation. // Time (n+1)->np1, n->n, (n-1)->n1 ---*/
4145  vector<vector<su2double> > x_np1(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
4146 
4147  /*--- Values from previous movement of spring at true time step n+1
4148  We use this values because we are solving for delta changes not absolute changes ---*/
4149  vector<vector<su2double> > x_np1_old = config->GetAeroelastic_np1(iMarker);
4150 
4151  /*--- Values at previous timesteps. ---*/
4152  vector<vector<su2double> > x_n = config->GetAeroelastic_n(iMarker);
4153  vector<vector<su2double> > x_n1 = config->GetAeroelastic_n1(iMarker);
4154 
4155  /*--- Set up of variables used to solve the structural problem. ---*/
4156  vector<su2double> f_tilde(2,0.0);
4157  vector<vector<su2double> > A_inv(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
4158  su2double detA;
4159  su2double s1, s2;
4160  vector<su2double> rhs(2,0.0); //right hand side
4161  vector<su2double> eta(2,0.0);
4162  vector<su2double> eta_dot(2,0.0);
4163 
4164  /*--- Forcing Term ---*/
4165  su2double cons = vf*vf/PI_NUMBER;
4166  vector<su2double> f(2,0.0);
4167  f[0] = cons*(-Cl);
4168  f[1] = cons*(2*-Cm);
4169 
4170  //f_tilde = Phi'*f
4171  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
4172  f_tilde[i] = 0;
4173  for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
4174  f_tilde[i] += Phi[k][i]*f[k]; //PHI transpose
4175  }
4176  }
4177 
4178  /*--- solve each decoupled equation (The inverse of the 2x2 matrix is provided) ---*/
4179  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
4180  /* Matrix Inverse */
4181  detA = 9.0/(4.0*dt*dt) + 3*w[i]*xi[i]/(dt) + w[i]*w[i];
4182  A_inv[0][0] = 1/detA * (3/(2.0*dt) + 2*xi[i]*w[i]);
4183  A_inv[0][1] = 1/detA * 1;
4184  A_inv[1][0] = 1/detA * -w[i]*w[i];
4185  A_inv[1][1] = 1/detA * 3/(2.0*dt);
4186 
4187  /* Source Terms from previous iterations */
4188  s1 = (-4*x_n[0][i] + x_n1[0][i])/(2.0*dt);
4189  s2 = (-4*x_n[1][i] + x_n1[1][i])/(2.0*dt);
4190 
4191  /* Problem Right Hand Side */
4192  rhs[0] = -s1;
4193  rhs[1] = f_tilde[i]-s2;
4194 
4195  /* Solve the equations */
4196  x_np1[0][i] = A_inv[0][0]*rhs[0] + A_inv[0][1]*rhs[1];
4197  x_np1[1][i] = A_inv[1][0]*rhs[0] + A_inv[1][1]*rhs[1];
4198 
4199  eta[i] = x_np1[0][i]-x_np1_old[0][i]; // For displacements, the change(deltas) is used.
4200  eta_dot[i] = x_np1[1][i]; // For velocities, absolute values are used.
4201  }
4202 
4203  /*--- Transform back from the generalized coordinates to get the actual displacements in plunge and pitch q = Phi*eta ---*/
4204  vector<su2double> q(2,0.0);
4205  vector<su2double> q_dot(2,0.0);
4206  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
4207  q[i] = 0;
4208  q_dot[i] = 0;
4209  for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
4210  q[i] += Phi[i][k]*eta[k];
4211  q_dot[i] += Phi[i][k]*eta_dot[k];
4212  }
4213  }
4214 
4215  su2double dh = b*q[0];
4216  su2double dalpha = q[1];
4217 
4218  su2double h_dot = w_alpha*b*q_dot[0]; //The w_a brings it back to actual time.
4219  su2double alpha_dot = w_alpha*q_dot[1];
4220 
4221  /*--- Set the solution of the structural equations ---*/
4222  displacements[0] = dh;
4223  displacements[1] = dalpha;
4224  displacements[2] = h_dot;
4225  displacements[3] = alpha_dot;
4226 
4227  /*--- Calculate the total plunge and total pitch displacements for the unsteady step by summing the displacement at each sudo time step ---*/
4228  su2double pitch, plunge;
4229  pitch = config->GetAeroelastic_pitch(iMarker);
4230  plunge = config->GetAeroelastic_plunge(iMarker);
4231 
4232  config->SetAeroelastic_pitch(iMarker , pitch+dalpha);
4233  config->SetAeroelastic_plunge(iMarker , plunge+dh/b);
4234 
4235  /*--- Set the Aeroelastic solution at time n+1. This gets update every sudo time step
4236  and after convering the sudo time step the solution at n+1 get moved to the solution at n
4237  in SetDualTime_Solver method ---*/
4238 
4239  config->SetAeroelastic_np1(iMarker, x_np1);
4240 
4241 }
4242 
4243 void CSolver::Restart_OldGeometry(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config) {
4244 
4245  /*--- This function is intended for dual time simulations ---*/
4246 
4247  int Unst_RestartIter;
4248  ifstream restart_file_n;
4249 
4250  string filename = config->GetSolution_FileName();
4251  string filename_n;
4252 
4253  /*--- Auxiliary vector for storing the coordinates ---*/
4254  su2double *Coord;
4255  Coord = new su2double[nDim];
4256 
4257  /*--- Variables for reading the restart files ---*/
4258  string text_line;
4259  long iPoint_Local;
4260  unsigned long iPoint_Global_Local = 0, iPoint_Global = 0;
4261  unsigned short rbuf_NotMatching, sbuf_NotMatching;
4262 
4263  /*--- First, we load the restart file for time n ---*/
4264 
4265  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4266 
4267  /*--- Modify file name for an unsteady restart ---*/
4268  Unst_RestartIter = SU2_TYPE::Int(config->GetRestart_Iter())-1;
4269  filename_n = config->GetFilename(filename, ".csv", Unst_RestartIter);
4270 
4271  /*--- Open the restart file, throw an error if this fails. ---*/
4272 
4273  restart_file_n.open(filename_n.data(), ios::in);
4274  if (restart_file_n.fail()) {
4275  SU2_MPI::Error(string("There is no flow restart file ") + filename_n, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4276  }
4277 
4278  /*--- First, set all indices to a negative value by default, and Global n indices to 0 ---*/
4279  iPoint_Global_Local = 0; iPoint_Global = 0;
4280 
4281  /*--- Read all lines in the restart file ---*/
4282  /*--- The first line is the header ---*/
4283 
4284  getline (restart_file_n, text_line);
4285 
4286  for (iPoint_Global = 0; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++ ) {
4287 
4288  getline (restart_file_n, text_line);
4289 
4290  vector<string> point_line = PrintingToolbox::split(text_line, ',');
4291 
4292  /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
4293  on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
4294 
4295  iPoint_Local = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
4296 
4297  if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
4298 
4299  Coord[0] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[1]);
4300  Coord[1] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[2]);
4301  if (nDim == 3){
4302  Coord[2] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[3]);
4303  }
4304  geometry->node[iPoint_Local]->SetCoord_n(Coord);
4305 
4306  iPoint_Global_Local++;
4307  }
4308  }
4309 
4310  /*--- Detect a wrong solution file ---*/
4311 
4312  rbuf_NotMatching = 0; sbuf_NotMatching = 0;
4313 
4314  if (iPoint_Global_Local < geometry->GetnPointDomain()) { sbuf_NotMatching = 1; }
4315 
4316  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&sbuf_NotMatching, &rbuf_NotMatching, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
4317 
4318  if (rbuf_NotMatching != 0) {
4319  SU2_MPI::Error(string("The solution file ") + filename + string(" doesn't match with the mesh file!\n") +
4320  string("It could be empty lines at the end of the file."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4321  }
4322 
4323  /*--- Close the restart file ---*/
4324 
4325  restart_file_n.close();
4326 
4327  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4328  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4329 
4330  /*--- Now, we load the restart file for time n-1, if the simulation is 2nd Order ---*/
4331 
4332  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == DT_STEPPING_2ND) {
4333 
4334  ifstream restart_file_n1;
4335  string filename_n1;
4336 
4337  /*--- Modify file name for an unsteady restart ---*/
4338  Unst_RestartIter = SU2_TYPE::Int(config->GetRestart_Iter())-2;
4339  filename_n1 = config->GetFilename(filename, ".csv", Unst_RestartIter);
4340 
4341  /*--- Open the restart file, throw an error if this fails. ---*/
4342 
4343  restart_file_n1.open(filename_n1.data(), ios::in);
4344  if (restart_file_n1.fail()) {
4345  SU2_MPI::Error(string("There is no flow restart file ") + filename_n1, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4346 
4347  }
4348 
4349  /*--- First, set all indices to a negative value by default, and Global n indices to 0 ---*/
4350  iPoint_Global_Local = 0; iPoint_Global = 0;
4351 
4352  /*--- Read all lines in the restart file ---*/
4353  /*--- The first line is the header ---*/
4354 
4355  getline (restart_file_n1, text_line);
4356 
4357  for (iPoint_Global = 0; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++ ) {
4358 
4359  getline (restart_file_n1, text_line);
4360 
4361  vector<string> point_line = PrintingToolbox::split(text_line, ',');
4362 
4363  /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
4364  on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
4365 
4366  iPoint_Local = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
4367 
4368  if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
4369 
4370  Coord[0] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[1]);
4371  Coord[1] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[2]);
4372  if (nDim == 3){
4373  Coord[2] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[3]);
4374  }
4375 
4376  geometry->node[iPoint_Local]->SetCoord_n1(Coord);
4377 
4378  iPoint_Global_Local++;
4379  }
4380 
4381  }
4382 
4383  /*--- Detect a wrong solution file ---*/
4384 
4385  rbuf_NotMatching = 0; sbuf_NotMatching = 0;
4386 
4387  if (iPoint_Global_Local < geometry->GetnPointDomain()) { sbuf_NotMatching = 1; }
4388 
4389  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&sbuf_NotMatching, &rbuf_NotMatching, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
4390 
4391  if (rbuf_NotMatching != 0) {
4392  SU2_MPI::Error(string("The solution file ") + filename + string(" doesn't match with the mesh file!\n") +
4393  string("It could be empty lines at the end of the file."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4394  }
4395 
4396  /*--- Close the restart file ---*/
4397 
4398  restart_file_n1.close();
4399 
4400  }
4401 
4402  /*--- It's necessary to communicate this information ---*/
4403 
4404  geometry->InitiateComms(geometry, config, COORDINATES_OLD);
4405  geometry->CompleteComms(geometry, config, COORDINATES_OLD);
4406 
4407  delete [] Coord;
4408 
4409 }
4410 
4411 void CSolver::Read_SU2_Restart_ASCII(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, string val_filename) {
4412 
4413  ifstream restart_file;
4414  string text_line, Tag;
4415  unsigned short iVar;
4416  long iPoint_Local = 0; unsigned long iPoint_Global = 0;
4417  int counter = 0;
4418  fields.clear();
4419 
4420  Restart_Vars = new int[5];
4421 
4422  string error_string = "Note: ASCII restart files must be in CSV format since v7.0.\n"
4423  "Check https://su2code.github.io/docs/Guide-to-v7 for more information.";
4424 
4425  /*--- First, check that this is not a binary restart file. ---*/
4426 
4427  char fname[100];
4428  val_filename += ".csv";
4429  strcpy(fname, val_filename.c_str());
4430  int magic_number;
4431 
4432 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
4433 
4434  /*--- Serial binary input. ---*/
4435 
4436  FILE *fhw;
4437  fhw = fopen(fname,"rb");
4438  size_t ret;
4439 
4440  /*--- Error check for opening the file. ---*/
4441 
4442  if (!fhw) {
4443  SU2_MPI::Error(string("Unable to open SU2 restart file ") + fname, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4444  }
4445 
4446  /*--- Attempt to read the first int, which should be our magic number. ---*/
4447 
4448  ret = fread(&magic_number, sizeof(int), 1, fhw);
4449  if (ret != 1) {
4450  SU2_MPI::Error("Error reading restart file.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4451  }
4452 
4453  /*--- Check that this is an SU2 binary file. SU2 binary files
4454  have the hex representation of "SU2" as the first int in the file. ---*/
4455 
4456  if (magic_number == 535532) {
4457  SU2_MPI::Error(string("File ") + string(fname) + string(" is a binary SU2 restart file, expected ASCII.\n") +
4458  string("SU2 reads/writes binary restart files by default.\n") +
4459  string("Note that backward compatibility for ASCII restart files is\n") +
4460  string("possible with the WRT_BINARY_RESTART / READ_BINARY_RESTART options."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4461  }
4462 
4463  fclose(fhw);
4464 
4465 #else
4466 
4467  /*--- Parallel binary input using MPI I/O. ---*/
4468 
4469  MPI_File fhw;
4470  int ierr;
4471 
4472  /*--- All ranks open the file using MPI. ---*/
4473 
4474  ierr = MPI_File_open(MPI_COMM_WORLD, fname, MPI_MODE_RDONLY, MPI_INFO_NULL, &fhw);
4475 
4476  /*--- Error check opening the file. ---*/
4477 
4478  if (ierr) {
